net.akaish.kitty.orm

Class AVUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.akaish.kitty.orm.AVUtils

  • class AVUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for checking accepted values defined in KITTY_COLUMN_ACCEPTED_VALUES Created by akaish on 03.04.18.
    Author:
    akaish (Denis Bogomolov)

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) static void checkByteValue(java.lang.Byte byteValue, KittyColumnConfiguration column, java.lang.Class modelClass)
      Checks if provided byteValue suites constraint described in KITTY_COLUMN_ACCEPTED_VALUES.acceptedValuesByte() and throws KittyRuntimeException if this value is restricted one.
      (package private) static void checkDoubleValue(java.lang.Double doubleValue, KittyColumnConfiguration column, java.lang.Class modelClass)
      Checks if provided doubleValue suites constraint described in KITTY_COLUMN_ACCEPTED_VALUES.acceptedValuesDouble() and throws KittyRuntimeException if this value is restricted one.

      Checks if provided floatValue suites constraint described in KITTY_COLUMN_ACCEPTED_VALUES.acceptedValuesFloat() and throws KittyRuntimeException if this value is restricted one.
      (package private) static void checkIntValue(java.lang.Integer intValue, KittyColumnConfiguration column, java.lang.Class modelClass)
      Checks if provided intValue suites constraint described in KITTY_COLUMN_ACCEPTED_VALUES.acceptedValuesInt() and throws KittyRuntimeException if this value is restricted one.

      Checks if provided doubleValue suites constraint described in KITTY_COLUMN_ACCEPTED_VALUES.acceptedValuesLong() and throws KittyRuntimeException if this value is restricted one.

      Checks if provided shortValue suites constraint described in KITTY_COLUMN_ACCEPTED_VALUES.acceptedValuesShort() and throws KittyRuntimeException if this value is restricted one.
      (package private) static void checkStringValue(java.lang.String value, KittyColumnConfiguration column, java.lang.Class modelClass)
      Checks if provided stringValue suites constraint described in KITTY_COLUMN_ACCEPTED_VALUES.acceptedValuesInt() and throws KittyRuntimeException if this value is restricted one.
